pages.text: $(#630000)Bogle Factories can be used to produce smaller variants of the Bogle's explosive charges.$(br)Reducing the size, however, has rendered the charge inert, preventing it from detonating.
$(#630000)Can be used to add the Explosion brew effect to Brew Sacs. The effect causes the sac to deal damage similarly to the Harm effect, additionally exploding violently on a direct hit.
